A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A pretty trainwreck. Terrible pacing (unnecessary subplot destroys any tension)\, huge waste of creative capital\, no character development\, and so many 'gotcha!' moments that it's painful.

Characters literally hide their plan just to create synthetic movie tension.
This movie doesn't set up an interesting third installment of a trilogy\, it ruined the overarcing plot with by changing the director who got creative control.
It's on Netflix\, it's worth seeing but\, I wouldn't watch it twice.
